pages.text: The Fission Multiblock allows you to split apart the very fabric that holds elements together to form new elements. All elements except for Hydrogen can be split. The outputs will be decided by halving the input element's atomic number. Example: Gold (79) -> Zirconium (40) + Yttrium (39)
You can also put liquids inside to influence the $(thing)productivity, speed and energy$() bonuses of the reactor. See the config for more info, or just try it and see ;p.
